name: Coffee Dessert Maker Food Cooking - Make Candy Drink Salon Games!
name_original: Coffee Dessert Maker Food Cooking - Make Candy Drink Salon Games!
description:
Can you make delicious coffee drinks that go so well together with tasty desserts?

Play a super fun Kids Cooking Game and start making coffees, cappuccinos, lattes, cafe mochas and much more for your guests!

Have fun playing an awesome Kids Cooking Game today!! Enjoy an exciting kids story and gameplay!

This is a fun casual game , kids game , girl's game , and boy's game
